title: Quiz 5 - Seating Arrangement
instruction:
Directions (Q. 21 – 25): Study the following information carefully and answer the questions given below:

Eight persons S, T, U, V, W, X, Y and Z are sitting around a circular table but not necessarily in the same order. Some of them are not facing the centre.

(Note: Facing the some direction means if one faces the centre then the other also faces the centre and if one faces outward then the other also faces outward. Facing the opposite direction means if one faces the centre then the other faces outward and vice versa.)

W sits second to the left of Y, who is not facing the centre. Z and U are immediate neighbours of W. S is second to the right of Z. W sits third to the left of V and faces the same direction as S. U sits on the immediate right of X, who sits third to the left of S. V sits on the immediate right of T. U and T face the same direction.

quiz.text: What is the position of Mukesh with respect to the one who belongs to Delhi?
options: Third to the left
Third to the right
Fourth to the left
Second to the right
None of these

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is not true?
options: Mukesh faces outward.
Rohit belongs to Kolkata.
Anil is the immediate neighbour of Neeraj and Romil.
Anupam sits second to the left of Rohit.
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following sits second to the right of Neeraj?
options: The one who belongs to Ranchi
The one who belongs to Bhopal
The one who belongs to Gwalior
Mukesh
Rahul

quiz.text: How many persons sit between Rahul and the one who belongs to Bhopal if counted Anti Clock Wise from Rahul?
options: Three
Two
Four
One
More than four

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is true with respect to Rohit?
options: Rohit belongs to Patna.
Rohit faces outward.
The immediate neighbours of Rohit face outward.
Rohit belongs to Ranchi.
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following is third to the right of Aditya?
options: Aarti
Atulya
Aakash
No person sits third to the right of Aditya
None of these

quiz.text: What is the position of Akanksha with respect to Anamika?
options: Third to the left
Second to the right
Fourth to the left
Can't be determined
None of these

quiz.text: How many persons are there between Aakash and Akshay?
options: None
One
Two
Three
None of these

quiz.text: If Aarti is on the immediate right of Anamika then who among the following sits at the extreme ends of the line?
options: Atulya, Aakash
Aditya, Akshay
Akshay, Aarti
Aarti , Atulya
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following is fourth to the left of Atulya?
options: Anil
Aditya
Aakanksha
Can't be determined
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following is husband of H?
options: D
C
A
B
None of these

quiz.text: How many females are there in the family?
options: Two
Three
Four
Five
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following sits second to the right of F?
options: Father
Mother
Uncle
Sister
None of these

quiz.text: How many persons are there between C and his nephew (counting anticlockwise? from C)?
options: One
Two
Three
Four
None of these

quiz.text: How is B related to G?
options: Daughter
Grandson
Son
Granddaughter
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following sits opposite H?
options: E
D
J
Either [1] or [3]
None of these

quiz.text: What is the position of E with respect to K?
options: Fourth to the right
Third to the right
Third to the left
Second to the left
None of these

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and hence form a group. Which is the one that does not belong to that group?
options: KD
EJ
GI
HF
DK

quiz.text: If F sits second to the left of I, then who among the following sits third to the right of J?
options: H
K
E
Can’t be determined
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following sits exactly between J and K?
options: E
D
H
F
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following sits on the immediate left of Y?
options: T
W
S
Z
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following sits exactly between T and X when counted from the right of T?
options: W
Y
U
S
V

quiz.text: How many persons are not facing the centre?
options: Three
Four
One
Two
More than four

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is true regarding U?
options: U faces the centre.
Z sits second to the left of U.
X sits on the immediate right of U.
Only one person sits between U and Y.
Only three persons sits between U and S.

quiz.text: What is the position of X with respect to Z?
options: Third to the right
Third to the left
Fourth to the right
Fifth to the left
Second to the left
